name: Dual Wielder of the Flame Sword
text: When this card is Summoned: add 1 "Salamandra" from your Deck to your hand, and if you do; Special Summon 1 FIRE Warrior-Type monster from your Deck or Extra Deck, ignoring summoning conditions. You can only use the effect of "Dual Wielder of the Flame Sword" once per turn.
